name: Burning Spear
description: '''Winston Rodney''' [[Order of Distinction|OD]] (born 1 March 1945), better known by the stage name '''Burning Spear''', is a Jamaican [[roots reggae]] singer-songwriter, vocalist, and musician. Burning Spear is a [[Rastafarian movement|Rastafarian]] and one of the most influential and long-standing roots artists to emerge from the 1970s.
